Key Match Events: Blake Perkins robbed Noelvi Marte of a homer to end the sixth inning of a 4-4 game
Rookie Jackson Chourio hit a go-ahead homer in the ninth
Jake Bauers made a diving grab of a hard-hit grounder off the bat of Ty France to end the game
Post-Match Reflections: David Bell expressed frustration over the team's loss and the Brewers' defensive plays
Bell lamented that the Reds couldn't play defense like the Brewers showed
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Brewers have won their ninth game in 12 tries against the Reds this season
The Reds' biggest weapon was the strikeout pitch, with 14 Milwaukee batters fanned
Others: Willy Adames hit his 27th roundtripper and 12th this season with two men aboard
Spencer Steer had a two-run single in the fifth
Amed Rosario tied the game with a 420â€“foot two-run homer in the sixth
